channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - July 2, 2021
channel.description:
Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - July 2, 2021
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-july-2-2021) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog and, in addition to the usual calendar games, includes videos from last weekend's **Gauntlet Community Open Gaming**! This week we've got sessions of these great games:
* _10 Million HP Planet_ * _Against the Dark Conspiracy_ * _Hearts of Wulin_ * _Hit the Nazi - Retrieve the Ark_ * _Hutt Cartel_ * _MOTH-LIGHT_ * _Paragon System_ * _Rebel Crown_ * _Storm Furies_ * _Sunset Kills_ * _Team-Up_ * _The Great American Witch_ * _The Green Knight RPG_ * _Trophy Dark_ * _Wolfspell_ * _World of Gamma_
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Calendar category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-calendar) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Calendar](https://gauntletcalendar.com/events) to play!
